question.theQuestion: How do you comment in an HTML5 document?

answers.answer: You don't need any special characters to comment, you can just write it in the document.

question.theQuestion: How is an end tag different from a start tag?

answers.answer: An end tag has a forward slash before the tag name.
An end tag is only found at the very end of the HTML document.
Start tags have the word 'start' in them and end tags have the word 'end' in them.
An end tag is used to end and HTML statement, it uses a backslash to differentiate from a start tag.
